conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-1;Violation of Art. 5-4;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;No violation of Art. 14+5-4;Just satisfaction reserved
docname: CASE OF BOUAMAR v. BELGIUM - [Russian Translation]
